documentation.text: @notice all the Gyroscope reserve funds are stored in this address

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)
function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)

GovernorChangeRequested(address).notice: Emmited when the governor is change is requested

GovernorChanged(address,address).notice: Emmited when the governor is changed

acceptGovernance().notice: Called by the pending governor to approve the change

addManager(address).notice: Adds a manager, who will be allowed to withdraw from this reserve

changeGovernor(address).notice: Changes the governor can only be called by the current governor

depositToken(address,uint256).notice: Deposits vault tokens in the reserve

params.amount: amount of the vault tokens to deposit

managers().notice: the address of the reserve managers, the only entities allowed to withdraw from this reserve

withdrawToken(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws vault tokens from the reserve

params.amount: amount of the vault tokens to deposit

natspec.notice: all the Gyroscope reserve funds are stored in this address
